title: Mood Tracker
desc: Mood Tracker that uses sentiment analysis and time series methods to track, visualize, and analyze emotional trends over time, providing insights into mood patterns.

title: Simvestify
desc: Simvestify is a stock simulation app that helps users track, buy, and sell stocks, while managing their portfolio and balance using real-time market data.

title: Diabetes Prediction Model
desc: A machine learning model that predicts whether a user will have diabetes or not.

title: Internly
desc: Internly is a full-stack internship management system where students can discover and apply for opportunities, and companies can post positions and track applications efficiently.

title: Weather ETL Pipeline
desc: A full-stack ETL pipeline that collects, transforms, and stores real-time weather data, then visualizes insights through an interactive dashboard for end users.
